Paragraph: long wavelength blue - shifted by 40 nm and 108 nm with insertion of one and two thienyl spacers to PDTP-BT , the absorption coefficients at the absorption maxima increase from 3.6 × 10^4 ( PDTP-BT ) to 4.0 × 10^4 ( PDTP - DTBT ) and 4.7 × 10^4 L mol^-1 cm^-1 ( PDTP-DT2BT ) , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| PDTP-BT |
| PDTP-DTBT |
| PDTP-DT2BT |

These are the entities in the paragraph that can be identified as material names, as they are clearly referred to as different compounds in the text.
